rows.des: Istanbul | Cappadocia (2N) | Kusadasi (2N) | Pamukkale (1N) | Istanbul (3N) | Istanbul

package.Name: Best Of Turkey (2N Cappadocia + 2N Kusadasi + 1N Pamukkale + 3N Istanbul)

rows.Inclusion:
• 03 Nights (02+01 split) stay at the mentioned hotel or similar in Istanbul 
  • 02 Nights stay at the mentioned hotel or similar in Cappadocia
  • Daily breakfast at the hotels except on arrival day
  • 02 local dinners at the hotel in Cappadocia
  • 01 FD Istanbul Old City Tour with local lunch in Istanbul
  • 01 FD Goreme-North Cappadocia Tour with local lunch in Cappadocia
  • All sightseeing tours on SIC basis with local English speaking guide asistance during the tours
  • Airport – Hotel – Airport Transfers on SIC basis in Cappadoccia
  • Airport – Hotel – Airport Return Transfer Services on SIC basis in Istanbul
  • All VATS
rows.Exclusions:
• Flight Tickets, Interconnecting flights OR Visa is not included in above cost
  • TCS will be applicable extra as per Govt. regulations
  • RT PCR if applicable is not included
  • Any Kind of Travel or Health Insurance is not included in mentioned cost.
  • Guide is not included in above package.
  • All personal expenses like tips, Portage, laundry, telephone calls/fax, alcoholic beverages, camera/video camera fees at monuments, entrances fees, medical expenses, airport departure tax etc.
  • Anything, which is not mentioned under Package Inclusions.
  • Cost incidental to any change in the itinerary/stay on an account of flight cancellation due to bad weather, ill health, and roadblocks and/or any factors beyond control.
  • For any unutilized service no refund will be provided
  • Any Tips to Driver & Guide

finalSightseeingArray.2: Uc Guzeller and Devrent  Valley, Goreme Open Air Museum, Uchisar Castle and Esentepe
finalSightseeingArray.4: The Temple of Hadrian, The Polio Fountain, Ephesus, Library of Celsius, House of Virgin Mary
finalSightseeingArray.7: Hagia Sophia, BLUE MOSQUE, Hippodrome, Serpentine Column, Obelisk of Theodosius, GERMAN Fountain of Wilhelm II, Topkapi Palace Museum, GRAND COVERED BAZAAR
finalSightseeingArray.8: Dolmabahce Palace, Rumeli Fortress, Golden Horn, Byzantine City Walls, Spice Bazaar (Egyptian Bazaar)
